Alice said in round 1:

If you agree to both pick choice_1, I promise to follow through on my end. We both win if we cooperate. Let me know if you agree to this plan.

I appreciate you proposing this cooperative strategy and committing to follow through if I agree. It shows you are approaching this rationally and in good faith.

Given the options and outcomes, it's clearly in both our interests to cooperate and choose choice_1. If either of us defects and chooses choice_2, we both end up worse off.

So I agree to your plan - I commit to choosing choice_1, and I trust you will do the same so we can reach the optimal outcome for us both. No need for further discussion, let's lock in choice_1.
